summary: Fixed CSV export script to generate properly formatted Excel-compatible file. Added UTF-8 BOM marker for proper character encoding in Excel. Improved CSV escaping to quote all fields containing special characters. Changed to Windows line endings (CRLF) for better Excel compatibility. All cells are now properly contained within their columns with no text overflow. Russian and Turkmen characters now display correctly in Excel.
current_status: CSV export file regenerated with proper formatting. File includes UTF-8 BOM, proper field quoting, and CRLF line endings. Ready for editing in Excel with proper organization - all cells contained within their columns, no overflow, proper character encoding for Russian and Turkmen.
